PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1998-01711998-02-120,  ,  ,  INDUSTRY, 
PrecisOrder (a) authorizing the incumbents of certain positions in the Department of Industry to exercise the powers and perform the duties of the DIRECTOR OF INVESTIGATION AND RESEARCH whenever the Director is absent or unable to act or whenever there is a vacancy in the office of Director, and (b) revoking Order in Council P.C. 1994-1449.
